featured.text: After dinner, Richard offered to pay the bill, but May insisted that they do it .
The concept was 11 by Richard Booth, who opened the first second-hand bookshop in Hay-on-Wye, UK in 1961.

definition.zh_def: 理查德，一個常見的男性名字。
definition.en_def: Richard, a common male given name.
definition.example: Richard is planning to travel to Europe next summer.
